titles.title: Lord Jesus! when we think of Thee

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord Jesus! when we think of Thee, Of all Thy love and grace, Our spirits long and fain would see Thy beauty face to face.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And though the wilderness we tread, A barren, thirsty ground, With thorns and briars overspread, Where foes and snares abound;{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yet in Thy love such depths we see, Our hearts o’erflow with praise— Content ourselves, while, Lord to Thee A joyful song we raise.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Blest Savior, keep our spirit stayed, Hard following after Thee, Till we, in victory displayed, Thy face in glory see.{/lang-eng}
